devdoc.details: This contract adheres to the PoolTogether yield source interfaceThis contract inherits OwnableUpgradable

returns._0: The underlying balance of asset tokens

params._yieldSource: Address of yield source used to initialize this swappable yield source

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.amount: The amount of `token()` to withdraw. Denominated in `token()` as above.

returns._0: The actual amount of tokens that were redeemed.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: The amount of `token()` to be supplied
params.to: The user whose balance will receive the tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Swappable yield source contract to allow a PoolTogether prize pool to swap between different yield sources

SwappableYieldSourceInitialized(address,.notice: Emitted when the swappable yield source is initialized

SwappedYieldSource(address,address).notice: Emitted when yield source has been successfuly swapped

balanceOfToken(address).notice: Returns the total balance (in asset tokens). This includes the deposits and interest.

depositToken().notice: Returns the ERC20 asset token used for deposits

initialize(address,address).notice: Initializes the swappable yield source with the yieldSource address provided

redeemToken(uint256).notice: Redeems tokens from the current yield source.

supplyTokenTo(uint256,address).notice: Supplies tokens to the current yield source. Allows assets to be supplied on other user's behalf using the `to` param.

userdoc.notice: Swappable yield source for a PoolTogether prize pool that generates yield by depositing into the specified yield source
